entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1100 metres. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1000 metres near noon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
